thread.title: Michelle. Church Hill, Tennessee
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Michelle. Church Hill, Tennessee

author: Michelle. Church Hill, Tennessee
title: Michelle. Church Hill, Tennessee
text: My cousin's mother passed away. I was not able to go to the funeral. I wanted to let her know that I cared by sending flowers. Ava's Flowers helped me out tremendously! I appreciate their caring attitude and service that I could trust! My cousin loved the flowers!
